title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
Wake up to the perfect cup of coffee every single day with the sleek and efficient Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed with a sophisticated black finish that complements any kitchen decor, this compact coffee maker is a must-have for coffee enthusiasts and busy professionals alike.

ðŸŒŸ **FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS:**

- **Versatile Brew Sizes:** Whether you prefer a strong, medium, or light cup, you can choose from three convenient brew sizes â€“ 6, 8, and 10 ounces â€“ to customize your coffee experience.
- **Speedy Brew Time:** In under a minute, your delicious, steaming-hot coffee is ready to enjoy, making your morning routine or afternoon break both convenient and enjoyable.
- **Generous Water Reservoir:** The large 36-ounce water reservoir is removable for easy filling and cleaning, ensuring that you can brew multiple cups before needing a refill.
- **Smart Start & Simple Controls:** Your coffee maker heats and brews in one simple process with Smart Start, and the intuitive button controls make operation a breeze.
- **Energy Efficient:** With an automatic shut-off feature after two hours of inactivity, you'll save energy without sacrificing the convenience of an always-ready coffee maker.
- **Convenience at its Best:** The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and catches any drips to keep your counter spotless.
- **Hot Water on Demand:** Need hot water for oatmeal, soup, or a cup of tea? The hot water dispense feature has got you covered.
- **Compact Size:** At just 8 inches wide, this coffee maker fits snugly in any space, making it ideal for smaller kitchens, dorm rooms, or offices.
- **Pod Compatibility:** Enjoy your favorite K-Cup pod varieties or use the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter to brew your own ground coffee (please note that the reusable filter is not included).

Whether it's the first cup of the day or a much-needed afternoon pick-me-up, the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker delivers a perfect brew every time. The packaging may vary, but the quality always remains the same. Upgrade your coffee game and indulge in the convenience and quality of Keurig today!

Wake up to the rich, pure taste of coffee with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. This sleek black beauty is the perfect addition to any kitchen, office, or dorm room. With a slim width of just 8 inches, it fits comfortably anywhere, saving you precious counter space without compromising on quality.

Imagine your favorite coffee, brewed to perfection in under a minute! Whether you prefer a mild 6 oz., a standard 8 oz., or a strong 10 oz. cup, the Keurig K-Compact has you covered. The 36 oz. removable water reservoir means you can brew multiple cups before needing a refill, making your morning routine or entertaining guests a breeze.

Smart Start technology heats and brews in one simple process, eliminating waiting for the water to warm up. With intuitive button controls, brewing your perfect cup is as easy as pressing a button. Plus, the energy-efficient auto-off feature ensures the coffee maker turns off two hours after the last brew, saving energy and giving you peace of mind.

Spills and splashes? No problem! The removable drip tray not only captures any accidental brews but also accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall, so you can take your coffee to-go without a hitch. And when you need a quick hot water fix, the hot water dispense function is at your service for oatmeal, soups, or tea.

The Keurig K-Compact is not only compatible with all the K-Cup pod varieties but also with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (sold separately), offering you the freedom to brew your own ground coffee.

Please note, packaging may vary, but the exceptional quality and convenience you expect from Keurig remains consistent. Upgrade your coffee experience with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. It's the small machine that brews big flavors, and it's just waiting for you to take it home!

Wake up to the rich, smooth, and delicious taste of your favorite coffee with the sleek and efficient Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed with your convenience in mind, this compact powerhouse is the perfect addition to any kitchen, dorm room, or office space.

**Key Features:**

- **Versatile Brewing Sizes:** Choose between 6, 8, and 10-ounce brew sizes to customize your coffee strength and quantity to perfection, all at the touch of a button.
- **Speedy Brew Time:** In a rush? No problem! Enjoy your favorite hot beverage brewed in under a minute, getting you out the door and on with your day without missing a beat.
- **Generous Water Reservoir:** The 36-ounce removable water tank minimizes refilling and is easy to clean, ensuring fresh-tasting coffee every time.
- **Smart Start Technology:** Heat and brew in one simple process with Smart Start, which significantly reduces your waiting time for that first sip of coffee.
- **Energy-Saving Features:** Automatic shut-off after 2 hours of inactivity helps conserve energy, making this coffee maker as eco-friendly as it is convenient.
- **Travel Mug Friendly:** Accommodate taller travel mugs up to 7 inches by easily removing the drip trayâ€”perfect for your on-the-go coffee needs.
- **Hot Water On Demand:** Not just for coffee, dispense hot water with the push of a button for instant soups, teas, or hot cocoa.
- **Slim Design:** At only 8 inches wide, this coffee maker fits snugly in any space without dominating your countertop.
- **K-Cup Pod Compatible:** Enjoy the vast variety of K-Cup pod flavors, or use your own coffee grounds with the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (sold separately).

Whether you're a casual coffee drinker or a connoisseur, the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker delivers a perfect cup every time, with the convenience and quality you've come to expect from Keurig.

Please note, packaging may vary, but the exceptional quality and performance of your Keurig coffee maker remain consistent.

Elevate your coffee experience today with the Keurig K-Compact and turn your kitchen into your personal cafÃ©!

**Wake Up to the Perfect Cup with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker**

Start your morning right with the sleek and efficient Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker. Designed to fit any kitchen or office, this slim and stylish coffee maker in classic black delivers your favorite beverages with ease and speed. 

**Quick Brew Technology** - Enjoy your cherished coffee flavors in no time! With a brewing time of under a minute, the Keurig K-Compact allows you to select from three cup sizes (6, 8, or 10 oz.) and makes your morning routine smoother than ever.

**Space-Saving Design** - At just 8 inches wide, this compact powerhouse is perfect for small countertops, leaving you ample space for all your coffee fixings.

**Large Water Reservoir** - The 36 oz. water reservoir is both ample and removable, making it a breeze to refill and clean, ensuring you can brew multiple cups before needing a top-up.

**Smart Start** - Your coffee machine heats and brews in one simple process. No need to wait for it to heat before selecting your cup size, making your brewing process seamless and straightforward.

**Intuitive Button Controls** - Simple button controls make it easy to brew your perfect cup every time.

**Energy Efficient** - With an auto-off feature that turns off your coffee maker 2 hours after the last brew, you'll save energy without sacrificing convenience.

**Travel Mug Friendly** - The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew for easy cleanup.

**Hot Water on Demand** - Need hot water for tea, hot cocoa, or instant meals? The hot water dispense feature ensures you have hot water whenever you need it, without the wait.

**K-Cup Pod Versatility** - Choose from hundreds of delicious K-Cup pod varieties or use the Keurig Universal My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (sold separately) to brew your favorite ground coffee.

Whether you're craving a bold dark roast to jump-start your day, a soothing herbal tea before bed, or anything in between, the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker is the perfect companion for your beverage needs. Please note, packaging may vary, but the quality and performance you expect from Keurig remain constant.

**Get your Keurig K-Compact today and savor the simplicity of great coffee, cup after delightful cup!**
